items.text: Monster Hunter World - Deviljho Concept Art
items.description: Detailed concept art and character design for the iconic Deviljho from Monster Hunter World. This project involved creating anatomical studies, texture work, and multiple pose variations.
Original character design for a fantasy RPG setting. Features detailed armor design, weapon concepts, and character backstory development.
Comprehensive anatomical study of mythical dragon creatures. Includes skeletal structure, musculature, and scale pattern designs.
Atmospheric environment art featuring moody lighting and detailed foliage. Created for a dark fantasy game setting.
3D digital sculpture of an original creature design. Includes high-poly modeling, texturing, and lighting setup.
